LoginMoto: On our app you stay connected with people and share photos, videos and much more with them.
PasswordRequired: Minimum 12 characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
VerificationEmailSended: Thank you for joining our social network. To complete the registration, please confirm your email by clicking on the confirmation link in the email, sent to your email address:
AdjustDarkMode: Adjust the appearance of Facebook to reduce glare and give your eyes a break.
CompactModeDesc: Make your font size smaller so more content can fit on the screen.
ShowPreviewsOfLinksDesc: Without opening a page to a person, event, or group, show info and actions in a preview window.
ShowPreviewHovering: Show preview when hovering pointer over link
CreateStoryDesc: Share a photo or write something
ResendEmailVerificationMessage: Your account is not verified. Please verify your account befor it gets deleted automatically.
EnterEmail: Please enter your E-Mail address to find your account.
HowToRecieveCode: How you want to receive the code to reset your password?
